Description: Part of the face and modius from a granodiorite sculpture of Queen Mutemwia enthroned aboard a barque.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1925 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 7. (pl.6)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
